
Common:
1.33:1 (4:3)
1.56:1 (14:9 - used for 4:3 and 16:9 compatibility)
1.78:1 (16:9)
1.85:1 (US theatrical 37:20)
2:1 (18:9 - Some Prime and Netflix)
2.35:1
2.39:1

Other:
1.43:1 (IMAX)
1.66:1 (European theatrical 5:3)
2.35:1 to 2.66:1 (Cinemascope)
2.59:1 to 2.65:1 (Cinerama)
2.76:1 (Ultra Panavision 70mm)

Main formats:
https://www.masterclass.com/articles/guide-to-aspect-ratios#8-aspect-ratios-to-use-for-films-and-tv

Exhaustive:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_motion_picture_film_formats
